product_name: Manduka Black Mat PRO Yoga Mat - 71"
long_description: The Manduka Black Mat(R) PRO yoga mat is known for its simple design, nonslip surface, thick cushioning and excellent durability. 0.25 in. thickness cushions your spine, hips, knees and elbows on hard surfaces. Slip-resistant fabriclike top surface does not get sticky, even when wet with perspiration. Dot pattern on the bottom keeps the mat from sliding on many different surfaces.
short_description: The Manduka Black Mat(R) PRO yoga mat is known for its simple design, nonslip surface, thick cushioning and excellent durability.
